snippet.title: Konsui Fighter - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Trapped within a deep coma, professor Ayumu Tsuburaya struggles to regain his memory of the events that led to his condition. Searching his inner mind, the beings that make up the fabric of his personality emerge, locked in conflict. As the Tournament of the Mind begins, will Ayumu's mind regain order, or will it remain forever lost in chaos?

Konsui Fighter is a hand-drawn fighting game created from the ground up for portable devices by developer Circean Studios.

Early Access: https://konsuifighter.com/early

Official Website: https://konsuifighter.com

Circean Studios: https://circeanstudios.com
